doc.title: The Umbrella
doc.plot: The Umbrella is a film about the cycle of life. Set in an everyday metropolitan scenario, and shot in stark colors, it conveys the powerful message of 'What goes around comes around'. The film achieves this by following a bright red umbrella during the course of a single morning,using it as a simple metaphor. On the way, the film also explores the themes of blindness, chance, and urban living.
